item.title: About
item.description:
General Arcade is a porting house and co-development studio based in Singapore and Malaysia. We’ve provided services for Larian, 505 Games, Square Enix, Capcom, SEGA, From Software, Devolver Digital, GOG, TinyBuild, The Indie Stone and others.

General Arcade was involved in the development of the following titles and IPs: Metal Wolf Chaos XD, Duke Nukem 3D, Dragon’s Dogma, Shadow Warrior, Cat Quest 2, VA-11 HALL-A, Tooth and Tail, Tacoma, Hotline Miami 2, Gone Home, Luftrausers, etc.

item.title: Switch 2 Porting
item.description:
Nintendo Switch 2 Porting & Co-Development

The Nintendo Switch 2 has taken the industry by storm — breaking sales records and setting a new standard for hybrid gaming. By August 1, 2025, more than 6 million units have been sold worldwide (according to Nintendo’s latest financial results).

Yet, while the original Switch eShop features thousands of titles, the Nintendo Switch 2 eShop currently lists only 46 games (US store). This represents a massive opportunity for developers and publishers to bring their games to a huge, rapidly growing audience — and we can help you do it.
